attributes.action: When a prime minister resignes, a general election must be called.
attributes.additional_details:
The country needs to have a choice in who governs the country. To often including the latest with liz truss prime ministers will resign and they appoint the next prime minister without any confidence from the public.
We the people want an immediate change in law to stop this in house promotion for prime minister.

We are now in economic and social crisis with yet another prime minister just about to start with no vote or choice from the general public.
I want law passed that erradicates the abuse of votes.
attributes.background: Put the vote back to the people  with a general election when the prime minister resigns or is given a vote of no confidence within his or her own party.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
